_header: S missed in the middle and mark there a P

BLCottRollsII23.First Lines:
S mysed in myndes and marke þere a PS set by hem self savand a
                    I…
BLCottRollsII23.Last Lines:
…And of cristen coown[?] mon he berehethenes mon haly holde at
                    his will

SocAnt101.First Lines:
S misid in þe middes in merked A Pthe toth correctid in
                        ther
thaire tides mikel tene…
SocAnt101.Last Lines:
…Of all cristyne crowne must he bereAnd hethenesse must hooly
                    hold as he wille
SocAnt101.Editions:
Weiskott,  Eric. 
             “ The Ireland Prophecy: Text and Metrical Context.” 
             Studies in Philology
         117 (2017): 245-7: 257-63 (critical edition).

NLWPen26.First Lines: As I mused in my dys meckyll towart…
NLWPen26.Note: 56-line version. Late fifteenth century. Formerly listed as 621.

See Weiskott (2020)
